historyP1: This cooperative has been in existence for xxx years and began its work with the promotion of the first program, which was the first 110 homes in the Malagueira neighborhood, designed by the architect Siza Vieira.
historyP2: The cooperative initially began with the support of Ã‰vora Town Hall, which provided land and the project, and INH (now IHRU), which gave technical and financial support.
historyP3: With the conclusion of this support and taking advantage of the success and trust placed in it by its members, the cooperative continued its mission independently, having weathered the post-2008 real estate crisis and even expanded its regions of operation.
